name: Grandhalay
body:
Grandhalay is open-source Integrated Library Management software


![welcome screen](http://i.imgur.com/ztN92hs.png)
![books page](http://i.imgur.com/6OErE0J.png)
![students page](http://i.imgur.com/cHPKY8N.png)
![adding students](http://i.imgur.com/6vJZ3kE.png)
![adding books](http://i.imgur.com/t05PWea.png)



Git clone URL
```
$ git clone https://github.com/sharan01/Grandalay.git

```
view documentation for set-up and usage
### Authors and Contributors
You can contact @sharan01 for support information
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
